name: MusicStarz 3D
description:
Are you ready to be a world known music star and reach your most glamorous dreams? Do you want to be at the top of the world? Your dream of becoming the next superstar of the world is about to get real in MusicStarz 3D. This is a journey from being a street singer to a world star idol.

Let’s gather your band, pick your instruments, choose your style, and start to step up the ladders of being famous, rich and glorious. From ghetto streets to biggest venues, MusicStarz gives you the perfect feeling of becoming a superstar. If you are ready for this brand new adventure, let’s play and GET READY TO RUMMMBLE!

- You’ll start your career on the street.
- Gather your band.
- Improve your talents
- Choose your style
- Lots of unique and different outfits and accessories
- Open new instruments to make music better.
- Catch up the rhythm to earn more money and fame!

ARE YOU READY TO ROCK WITH MUSICSTARZ 3D?
